name: Gang man Shooter FREE - Clash Of The Mafia Squad
name_original: Gang man Shooter FREE - Clash Of The Mafia Squad
description:
***** YOU are a 70's Mafia boss! Take NO prisoners! *****

Revered by all, known only to some as "Gang man". Shoot your way out of the 70's disco before it's too late.

In this trippy club you'll have to defend yourself against crazy horses, glammed up girls, toilets on fire (yes we did say toilets on fire - why? - Why not!) and other foe.

Don't worry you'll use your Mafia skills to execute everyone.
Collect musical notes to upgrade your weaponry:

- Detonate dynamite and blow stuff up
- Upgrade to a Hand Gun for fast and frantic gun fire action
- Upgrade to an awesome Shot Gun for maximum impact
- Did we mention you can fly? :-D

Fun multiplayer, intuitive controls and Top Mafia Score Board will keep you coming back for more.

Take 'em all down before you're assassinated!

Download FREE today...
